ygData.msgSnippet: Take a pound of Soldier and a few ounces of Cleric, stir em around till the mixture is creamy, drip in some Essence of Hybrid and cook for 10 minutes to make

Take a pound of Soldier and a few ounces of Cleric, stir 'em 
around 'till the mixture is creamy, drip in some Essence of Hybrid 
and cook for 10 minutes to make a Paladin!

Now, onto the serious part of the Paladin description.

Paladin (hybrid of Soldier+Cleric)
Normal attack: same as Soldier
Specials:
1) Charge/Heal [The two basic abilities in one, since a paladin 
wouldn't need Mystic Mace]
2) Turn Undead [You don't REALLY think a Paladin would raise the 
dead, do you?]
3) Protect[all damage done to the target is halved]/Disarm
4) Ressurect

How does that do, for a combination?
